Voice Cast:



Minami Takayama as Conan Edogawa  Yukiko Iwai as Ayumi Yoshida  Wataru Takagi as Genta Kojima, Wataru Takagi  Ikue Otani as Mitsuhiko Tsuburaya  Megumi Hayashibara as Ai Haibara  Isshin Chiba as Kazunobu Chiba  Rikako Aikawa as Kayo Mayuzumi  Fumiya Tanaka as Ryo Naruoka  Junji Majima as Culprit (Kazuya Ando)  Yuki Kyoka as Female clerk  Yuki Okada as Male customer  Kanata Tanaka as Female customer

sections.Situation: Miki Fujino is found strangled at the park. Takagi then finds a stamp card on the ground next to the victim's body and realises it doesn't belong to the victim as she has one in her purse. They then decide to do a stakeout the next day. However, while buying food at convenience store, Chiba is spotted by Detective Boys, so he has no choice but to bring them along to the stakeout.
